channel.title: Help...please!
channel.description:
I am putting this anywhere I can think of. This is for my grandfather, Doug. The family has went into debt helping pay his hospital bills and we are struggling to come up with any extra. Mods if you can please allow this I am doing this for love of my grandfather.
http://www.gofundme.com/h0bhq8

item.title: Help...please!
item.dc:creator: @Not_a_bot Not_a_bot
item.description:
@Not_a_bot wrote:

I see that your a CoonHunter. I’ll hire you for a quick one or two day job to hunt down some coons I’ve come across. I live out in an area where they come out in gangs of like 4-5. They’re quite annoying and very aggressive, hard to see at night and always trying to loot garbage. I really need to get rid of them before they become a nuisance, I can’t do it alone. PM if interested. (great gig for something over the weekend).

Read full topic

item.title: Help...please!
item.dc:creator: @CoonHunter CoonHunter
item.description:
@CoonHunter wrote:

Ashi:

Ouch, our minimum wage is almost double that.

Exactly, please ask questions before assuming that I am just trying to get money. Minimum wage is supposed to be raised but that doesn’t mean its actually going to be.

Glad I finally got my point accross that I litterally and almost tapped out every month sending him what little I can. My parents make even less than I do.

Read full topic

item.title: Help...please!
item.dc:creator: @CoonHunter CoonHunter
item.description:
@CoonHunter wrote:

[quote=“Ashi, post:28, topic:547786”][quote author=Lil_Smok3r link=topic=666690.msg4457802#msg4457802 date=1415908488]

I hope you know, $2500 is a months wage on low income. If you save up now you can make this a Christmas present!

People on minimum wage aren’t able so save up money since they need the money for rent and food.

I don’t think the OP lives in Africa.

You should be jelly, British people get this shit for free

Nah, we pay for it through our taxes.
[/quote]
You can still claim your tax back.[/quote]
Min. Wage here in Mississippi, USA is still 7.25 an hour.

160 hours (usual month)
x7.25

1160
-20% (taxes)

$928 USD for the while month on minimum wage.

I make salary of 900 twice a month (1800 a month) now lets punch some numbers.
1800
-20%

1440
690 for just rent and car

750
500 (my monthly petro bill since I live a distance from work, yes this is an exact. Costs $250 per check)

250
Food for my fiance and myself will take up most of that usualy leaving us like $7-$8 per day to feed both of us. She is trying to find a job as I type.

Read full topic

item.title: Help...please!
item.dc:creator: @system system
item.description:
@system wrote:

[quote=“naseem142, post:30, topic:547786”][quote author=Vain_ link=topic=666690.msg4457829#msg4457829 date=1415919136]

I hope you know, $2500 is a months wage on low income. If you save up now you can make this a Christmas present!
[/quote]in what field?
im not paid minimum and i work a good 50-60 hours per week and i only bring around 800 bi-weekly. thats nowhere near 2500 whether i get 3 checks in the month or not.

and many of you are forgetting about basic expenses - gas/rent/food/healthcare/spouse/kids etc.

not everyone can afford things so easily.

@naseem - you’re a fudgetard for thinking this has anything to do with rsps. i pray that when you need financial help - nobody is there to support you.

@coon - prayers to you and your family. ill try to get some money sent with this next check. I’m pretty set on diapers for a while so i got a bit to spare.

It’s a topic with two pictures and some sad story on the internet asking “plz gimmie 2.5k dollas im too poor to help my grandfather bcuz fk u”.

At least a video of him asking would have helped a bit, Or anything else. I could literally do the same and ask for money, Either way don’t tell me you don’t have any spare 2500$ you worked on, I know a guy who has a shit job and can do better than you- Or it’s just your economy that needs fixing.

fudging hostile twats.[/quote]
raise the roof hostile twat

Read full topic
